author: cperezz.eth
content:
If anyone is looking for a fun afternoon and HAS AN NVIDIA GPU (or one that supports CUDA). 

I created https://github.com/CPerezz/worst_case_miner/blob/master/src/cuda_miner.rs to mine deep branches within the MPT to run some tests within bloatnet.

And I can't test the cuda miner as I lack a GPU. So if anyone wants to take the task of testing it works, I'd be really cool.

cc: <@267659707697594368> <@1116017667774611496> maybe you want to take a chance (since you expressed interest on stateful tests?)

author: brycehytan
content:
